Name: Smart Storage Configuration Message Registry

RebootAndRetryRequired.Resolution: Reboot the system then reapply the configuration.
RebootAndRetryRequired.Description: Indicates that a reboot is required then reapply the configuration.
RebootAndRetryRequired.Message: Reboot is required then reapply the configuration

CanSetEditableLogicalDriveInitialization.Resolution: Set the logical drive RAID level.
CanSetEditableLogicalDriveInitialization.Description: Indicates that the logical drive initialization method cannot be set because the logical drive has no RAID level set.
CanSetEditableLogicalDriveInitialization.Message: Initialization method for logical drive with ID "%1" cannot be set to %2 because the logical drive has no RAID level set

Success.Description: Indicates that all conditions of a successful operation have been met.

CanChangeEditableControllerExpandPriorit.Description: Indicates that the controller expand priority cannot be set because the desired expand priority is invalid.
CanChangeEditableControllerExpandPriorit.Message: Cannot set controller expand priority to %1 because it is invalid

CanAddEditableArraySpareDriveTooSmall.Description: Indicates that the spare drive cannot be added to the array because the selected drive is too small.
CanAddEditableArraySpareDriveTooSmall.Message: Cannot add spare drive %1 to logical drive with ID "%2" because it is too small

CanAddEditableDataDriveCannotMixDriveTyp.Description: Indicates that the data drive cannot be added to the array because its drive type does not match that of the array.

CanCreateEditableConfigInconsistentPortS.Resolution: Make the port settings consistent in the request and resubmit.

CanSetEditableLogicalDriveSizeLUCachingE.Description: Indicates that logical drive size cannot be set because LU cache is enabled on the controller.

CanChangeEditableControllerRebuildPriori.Description: Indicates that the controller does not support rapid rebuild.

ChangeConnectorModeUnsupportedOperation.Resolution: Remove the connector mode property from the request.
ChangeConnectorModeUnsupportedOperation.Description: Indicates that changing the connector mode is not supported on the connector.

CanDeleteEditableLogicalDriveUnknownErro.Description: Indicates that the logical drive size cannot be deleted for an unknown reason.

CanCreateEditableLogicalDriveUnknownErro.Description: Indicates that the logical drive cannot be created for an unknown reason.
CanCreateEditableLogicalDriveUnknownErro.Message: Cannot create logical drive with ID "%1"

CanSetEditableLogicalDriveArrayUnknownEr.Description: Indicates that the logical drive cannot be assigned to the array for an unknown reason.

CanChangeEditableControllerRebuildPriori.Description: Indicates that the controller rebuild priority cannot be set for an unknown reason.
